title: Residential Support Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Phone Screen. Sent Updated Resume. 2nd Virtual Interview through Microsoft Teams . Then moved on to the 3rd panel Virtual Interview. That took about 30 minutes . They introduced themselves and the program they work at. Then they asked 10-20 questions about my experience and situational questions. Then I had the opportunity to ask them any questions I had about CODAC
Interview Questions:
Most difficult customer I've experienced 

What experience do I have that relates to the job directly 

Strengths & Weaknesses

title: Recovery Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Submitted resume and was called two weeks later. Couldn’t understand what they wanted and the whole process took forever. HR was hard to get a hold of and provided no updates
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself and you can make codac better

title: Membership Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: 1st- interview by phone. 2nd- Panel interview. I was asked a variety of questions about the industry and my experience with customer service.  I was also asked about my experiences and how I learned as an individual. It was a common experience for the steps taken and questions asked. 3rd shadowing for the position
Interview Questions: Please describe a difficult interaction in a customer service position and how you handled it.

title: Business Analyst/Programmer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: Comfortable and thorough, got a good sense of the business and processes and the leadership style.  Good team that shows they communicate well.  They have exceptional listening and interpersonal skills.
Interview Questions: Well, they haven't offered yet, but it looks good and the drop down didn't have that as an option.  What can you bring to the team?

title: Recovery Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: I applied on line and was asked to go back and complete the pre-screen questions then a telephone Interview, Panel Interview, Background Check takes about 3 weeks.  I understand it takes 5-7 days to get a background check - call your references and give them a heads up.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work for CODAC?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: The internship I'm looking into is at CODAC to be able to graduate with my BA, my concern in the rest of the process, I've heard really bad thing about it and I'm scared, help.

title: Psychotherapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness
Interview Descriptions: group interview. Answered situational questions. Easy interview. Very comfortable experience. I felt positive after leaving interview and felt good about the agency, then I started dealing with HR and it all went downhill from there...they offered me the wrong job (and insisted they did not) took 4 weeks to be offered the correct job and they did not return calls during the process. It should have been a sign not to have accepted the job.

title: Recovery Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed individually at job fair first for screening process, then a panel interview, then background and reference check, then given offer, after receive new hire paperwork and a drug test, then training before starting.
Interview Questions: What experience do you have dealing with a member in a crisis?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Jul 2014
Interview Descriptions: You are hired on by an staffing agency that does not use skill evaluations. They just hire you if you pass the initial drug screening. But you can bring in fake urine to the screening.

title: Recovery Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: It was a panel interview and it was done with three members. There was two pages of different questions. Each person took turns asking the questions, and I had ample enough time to answer each one. I felt it was not a hard process.
Interview Questions: They asked how I felt about working with clients with HIV.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CODAC Health, Recovery & Wellness (Tucson, AZ) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: I applied online, had a phone interview a few days later. The phone interview was mostly costumer service type questions. Once I passed the phone interview, I had to take a small quiz online that looked at math skills and typing speed. Then, I had a group interview which was pretty easy.
Interview Questions: How would you determine a suicidal member?
